block.p: Major League Baseball MLB--Cut the suspension of Yankees C Jorge Posada from six games to five and upheld the $3,500 fine imposed on Sept. 7.
American League BOSTON RED SOX--Released RHP Carlos Castillo. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Agreed to terms with LHP Mark Mulder on a four-year contract.
Major League Baseball MLB--Cut the suspension of Yankees C Jorge Posada from six games to five and upheld the $3,500 fine imposed on Sept. 7.
American League BOSTON RED SOX--Released RHP Carlos Castillo. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Agreed to terms with LHP Mark Mulder on a four-year contract.
National League FLORIDA MARLINS--Announced the retirement of RHP Alex Fernandez.
HARLEM GLOBETROTTERS--Signed C Sharavjamts Shark Tserenjanhor.
National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed F Dickey Simpkins. UTAH JAZZ--Signed F Andrei Kirilenko.

JETS--Released G Tupe Peko. Signed P Daniel Pope and OL Josh Rawlings. BUFFALO BILLS--Signed LB Junior Robinson to the practice squad. Waived WR Chris Taylor. Placed LB Sam Cowart on injured reserve. DETROIT LIONS--Signed WR Latef Frim to the practice squad. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Released DB Hurley Tarver from the practice squad. Signed WR-KR J.J. Moses to the practice squad. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed T Dave Costa. Signed T Dan Goodspeed to the practice squad. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Signed G Shane Grice. Waived OL Leon Hires. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Released QB Jeff George. Signed QB Kent Graham and DT Tyronne Williams. Placed CB Donovan Greer on injured reserve. Activated CB Central McClellion from the practice squad.

NHL--Suspended Rangers D Dale Purinton four preseason games and fined him $1,000 for attempting to injure Islanders G Garth Snow during a Sept. 22 game. DEVILS--Assigned G Ari Ahonen, G Jean-Francois Damphousse, G Scott Clemmensen, G Frederic Henry, D Josef Boumedienne, D Mike Commodore, F Christian Berglund, F Max Birbraer, F Brian Gionta, F Stanislav Gron, F Mike Jefferson and F Michael Rupp to Albany of the AHL. ATLANTA THRASHERS--Assigned D Mike Weaver, F Bryan Adams, F Ben Simon, F Dan Snyder, F J.P. Vigier, G Scott Fankhouser and D Jeff Dessner to Chicago of the AHL. CALGARY FLAMES--Assigned G Levente Szuper, D Steve Montador, D Micki Dupont and F Dwayne Hay to Saint John of the AHL, and D Dallas Eakins to Chicago of the AHL. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Assigned LW Martin Spanhel, D Darrel Scoville, D Derrick Walser and D Jeff Ware to Syracuse of the AHL. Released RW Daniel Marois. DALLAS STARS--Assigned G Chad Alban, D Greg Hawgood, D Dan Jancevski, F Steve Gainey, F Jim Montgomery and F Gavin Morgan to Utah of the AHL. OTTAWA SENATORS--Agreed to terms with F Marian Hossa on a three-year contract. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Assigned G Vesa Toskala to Cleveland of the AHL. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Assigned RW Steve Kariya, F Artem Chubarov, F Brad Leeb and D Zenith Komarniski to Manitoba of the AHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Agreed to terms with C Jeff Halpern on a two-year contract. Reassigned D Nolan Yonkman to Portland of the AHL.
Major League Lacrosse BOSTON CANNONS--Announced the resignation of Mitch Whiteley, coach.
ARIZONA STATE--Suspended CB R.J. Oliver from the football team for two games for an unspecified violation of a team rule.
